channel.title: JEE on Aniruddha Deb
channel.description: Recent content in JEE on Aniruddha Deb

item.title: To IIT Delhi and beyond
item.description: I think an update on the JEE Situation has been due for a long time, and I’ll try to compress the past few months into this single post. Long story short, my JEE(M) was held on 2nd September, in the evening shift. After giving my best and getting a 260/300, I was disappointed (putting it mildly) to see the CRL of 1861 on my screen. AITS JEE(A) Mocks followed, and after giving three of them, I had to give my BITSAT.
